/usr/bin/c++    -ftemplate-depth-256 -Wall -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-unused-function -Wno-overloaded-virtual -Wno-unneeded-internal-declaration -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-return-type-c-linkage -stdlib=libstdc++ -O3 -DNDEBUG -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   -framework vecLib     CMakeFiles/mpi_pscan.dir/ising.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpi_pscan.dir/mpi_pscan.cpp.o  -o mpi_pscan  -L/Users/ricoh/Applications/alps/lib  -lalps -lboost /usr/local/Cellar/open-mpi/1.6.2/lib/libmpi_cxx.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/open-mpi/1.6.2/lib/libmpi.dylib /usr/lib/libm.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/hdf5/1.8.12/lib/libhdf5_hl.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/hdf5/1.8.12/lib/libhdf5.dylib /usr/local/lib/libsz.dylib /usr/lib/libz.dylib /usr/lib/libdl.dylib /usr/lib/libm.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/python/2.7.6/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/config/libpython2.7.a /usr/local/Cellar/hdf5/1.8.12/lib/libhdf5_hl.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/hdf5/1.8.12/lib/libhdf5.dylib /usr/local/lib/libsz.dylib /usr/lib/libz.dylib /usr/lib/libdl.dylib /usr/local/Cellar/python/2.7.6/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/config/libpython2.7.a -Wl,-rpath,/Users/ricoh/Applications/alps/lib
